name: Pibbles Dressup
description:
Completed over the course of a month, Pibbles Dressup was a fun little hobby project made with what little free time I had outside of my job. I wanted to see if I could release some kind of game and I kind of did! This was a good learning experience.

View on my website: https://piber.me/games/pibdressup/

Pibbles Dressup was made with LÖVE. For more info on the LÖVE project, see: https://love2d.org/
The web-embedded version was made possible by love.js. You can find this project at: https://github.com/Davidobot/love.js
